revised_title: Thermo-chemistry of Flame Spectra at High Temperatures
topics: Spectroscopy of Alkali and Alkaline Earth Metals
tldr: This study investigates the relationship between the bands and lines of the same element in the spectra of alkali and alkaline earth metals at high flame temperatures. The author examines the continuous spectra of various alkali-metal salts and observes a multitude of bands in the rays of lithium, sodium, and potassium, which occupy spaces within specific wave-lengths.
